DOC.brief_summary: This study aim compare knee extensor ' mechanical , morphological myoelectric property subject affect anterior knee pain healthy control group . The investigator hypothesis patient anterior knee pain present reduction knee extensor ' mechanical , morphological myoelectric property due chronic muscle inhibition produce syndrome . In addition , study also aim evaluate whether difference methodology application Interpolated Twitch Technique evaluation quadriceps muscle inhibition compare use supramaximal electrical stimulation femoral nerve ( gold standard ) stimulation motor point ( new methodology ) healthy subject individual affect anterior knee pain . The investigator hypothesis stimulation motor point less discomfortable femoral nerve muscle inhibition result less variable ( low dispersion ) due low discomfort
DOC.brief_title: Knee Extensor Muscle Properties Young Women Symptomatic Asymptomatic Anterior Knee Pain
DOC.detailed_description: Participants divide two group ( control group , n=16 anterior knee pain group , n=16 ) . Prior participation , informed consent obtain subject . The evaluation perform low limb severe symptom anterior knee pain patient , dominant limb control group . Quadriceps Muscle inhibition estimate use Interpolated Twitch Technique , involve apply single electrical twitch stimulation femoral nerve ( gold standard ) maximal isometric knee extensor contraction . Muscle inhibition measurement obtain aid Grass S88 ( Quincy , MA , USA . ) Muscle Stimulator combination isolation unit approve human use . Isometric isokinetic knee extensor torque obtain Biodex System 3 dynamometer ( Biodex Medical System , Shirley - NY , USA ) . Electromyographic muscle activity measure bipolar surface electrode ( Kendall , Meditrace - 100 ; Ag/AgCl ) place muscle belly vastus medialis , vastus lateralis rectus femoris . Muscle architecture measure B-mode ultrasonographic system ( SSD ; Aloka Inc. , Tokyo , Japan ) linear-array probe ( 60 mm , 7.5MHz ; Aloka ) . Single Leg Squat use clinical evaluation lower limb functionality .
DOC.criteria: Anterior Knee pain group : 1 . Retropatellar peripatellar knee pain least 2 follow functional activity : stair ascent descent , run , kneel , squat , prolonged sitting , jumping ; 2 . Score small 85 point Kujala Questionnaire ; 3 . Physically active accord International Physical Activity Questionnaire ( IPAQ short version ) 4 . Body mass index less 30 Control group : 1 . Knee painfree female history low limb injury 1 . Body mass index higher 30 2 . Sedentary subject 3 . Cardiovascular , neurological cognitive disorder 4 . Any cardiorespiratory , neuromuscular , metabolic disease could represent absolute contraindication contraindication performance maximum strength test 5 . Previous surgery low limb 6 . Participation strengthtraining programme physiotherapy treatment knee injury past six month 7 . Otherwise associated injury lower limb joint anterior knee pain syndrome 8 . Pregnancy
